TopicTitle: KSP 0.90 MK3 Cargo Bays Are White textured!!

Articles.Content: i started a ksp beta 0.90 career mode save and everything was good i unlocked the cargo bay parts and and they where good and great but after i have installed KAS (Kerbal attachment system) and Kerbal the texture of the bay doors changed to white textured i deleted module manager and installed the latest and the problem fixed but the next day the problem returned i tried other saves but nothing just if i delete the save so what to do ???!
Known issue in stock KSP. TGA textures sometimes fail to load as of .25 and above, and, err, porkjet used TGAs for the spaceplanes...
But Dude iam playing with Some mods
